name: No Platform No Jump Platformer
description:
You control with either A and D or the Left and Right arrow. You spawn boxes with the (Spacebar) and Reset the Level With (R) if you need it, 

You are the Green Box trying to collect all the Coins and then Get to the Goal (the Red Box) There Is no jump so you have to spawn boxes to get over gaps and such. they will always Spawn under you and push you up. there are gray boxes that Will prevent you from spawning other boxes when you are touching. Then there is the Black boxes It Will send you Back To the start of the level if you touch it and you will lose all the coins. 

All Levels have been played through and can be completed
